pageProduct.name: Wanderlust Wander Gut 75g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine to support gastrointestinal system health and relieve mild gut inflammation.

Wanderlust Wander Gut is a consciously created blend of plant
actives. Slippery Elm is traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine to support gastrointestinal system health and relieve mild gut inflammation. Lemon Balm
is traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine to reduce symptoms of stress and nervous indigestion. Turmeric is used in Ayurvedic medicine to relieve inflammation. Inulin derived from Chicory provides a natural prebiotic and assists the gut's natural cleansing processes.

Size: 75 g

Warnings

Contains sulfites.

If symptoms persist, talk to you health professional

Ingredients

EACH 4.5 g POWDER DOSE CONTAINS:
Ulmus rubra (Slippery Elm) stem bark inner powder 500 mg
Inulin 2.5 g
Melissa officinalis (Lemon Balm) herb ext. dry conc. 200 mg
Derived from dry 2 g
Curcuma longa (Turmeric) rhizome ext. dry conc. 50 mg
Derived from dry 1 g
Althaea officinalis (Marshmallow) root powder 250 mg
Zingiber officinale (Ginger) rhizome ext. dry conc. 10 mg
Derived from dry 200 mg
Cinnamomum verum (Cinnamon) stem bark powder 500 mg

Directions

DIRECTIONS FOR USE - ADULT DOSAGE:
Take 1 ½ metric teaspoons (4.5 g) daily or as directed by your healthcare professional. Mix into 150 mL of water and consume immediately.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a cool, dry
place away from direct heat
and sunlight. Do not use if
inner seal is missing or broken.
